```{r}
Original_Schedules <- OrignialSchedules_OriginalSchedules %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()


cleaned_data <- Original_Schedules %>% 
  mutate(
     date = lubridate::ymd(date),
     dateof_makeup = lubridate::ymd(dateof_makeup),
     dayof_week = factor(dayof_week),
     visiting_team = factor(visiting_team),
     visiting_team_league = factor(visiting_team_league),
     home_team = factor(home_team),
     home_team_league = factor(home_team_league),
     day_night = factor(day_night),
     postponement_cancellation_reason = factor(postponement_cancellation_reason)
  )
  

cleaned_data %>% 
  glimpse()
```
